name: Climb (itch) (GostikVlad)
description:
Deadline of the assignment got dangerously close and I have had a little time to come up with lengthy story and wanted to make something visually innovative in Twine 2.0.

With these constraints in mind, I tried to make a 3D world of simple descriptive words, that could be navigated by interacting with them.

What could be a poststructuralist's dream for one person can be also a very confusing frustrating labyrinth for the others, so feel no shame when rage quiting and accept my dearest apologies.

It's still more of a proof of concept than a complete indie game. 

Climb safe!

- Šimon Vladík
